# Sample Earth Gravity Model Coefficients
# Format: degree order C S
# This file contains low-degree coefficients for testing
# For production use, obtain EGM2008 or similar high-fidelity model
#
# Units: Normalized coefficients (unitless)
# Reference radius: 6378137.0 m (WGS84 equatorial radius)
# GM: 3.986004418e14 m^3/s^2

# Degree 0 (point mass - always 1.0 for normalized coefficients)
0 0 1.0 0.0

# Degree 2 (J2 - Earth's oblateness)
2 0 -1.082626683e-3 0.0
2 1 0.0 0.0
2 2 2.43914352398e-6 -1.40016683654e-6

# Degree 3
3 0 2.53266e-6 0.0
3 1 2.02799512490e-6 2.48513157716e-7
3 2 9.04627768605e-7 -6.19025944205e-7
3 3 7.21072657057e-7 1.41435626958e-6

4 1 -5.08725358464e-7 -4.73565545352e-7
